mapper.select: select * from product where product_type=#{type} order by product_code desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_pay ( product_pay_code, pay_id, product_code, buy_phone, gift_phone1, gift_phone2, gift_phone3, pay_type, pay_time, pay_cancle_able, order_num1, order_num2, order_num3 ) VALUES(pay_seq.nextval, #{pay_id},#{product_code},#{buy_phone},#{gift_phone1},#{gift_phone2},#{gift_phone3},#{pay_type}, sysdate,#{pay_cancle_able},#{order_num1},#{order_num2},#{order_num3})
mapper.select: SELECT product_pay_code,pay_id,buy_phone,gift_phone1,gift_phone2,gift_phone3, order_num1,order_num2,order_num3,pay_type, to_char(pay_time,'YYYY.MM.DD') as pay_time,pay_cancle_able, pd.product_code,pd.product_name,pd.product_cost,pd.product_photo_addr FROM product_pay pp,product pd WHERE pay_id=#{pay_id} and pay_cancle_able='N' and sysdate <= pay_time+180 AND pp.product_code=pd.product_code order by pp.product_pay_code desc
select count(*) from product_pay where pay_id=#{pay_id} and pay_cancle_able='N' and sysdate <= pay_time+180
select count(*) from product_pay where pay_id=#{pay_id}

select * from (select rownum rn,tt.* from (SELECT product_pay_code,pay_id,buy_phone,gift_phone1,gift_phone2,gift_phone3, order_num1,order_num2,order_num3, pay_type,to_char(pay_time,'YYYY.MM.DD') as pay_time,pay_cancle_able, pd.product_code,product_name,product_cost,product_photo_addr FROM product_pay pp,product pd WHERE pay_id=#{pay_id} AND pp.product_code=pd.product_code order by product_pay_code desc) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}
mapper.update: update product_pay set pay_cancle_able='Y' where product_pay_code=#{product_pay_code}
